name: The misadventures of Jeffrey Jetsam. Shouldn't that be flotsam? No, trust me on this one.
name_original: The misadventures of Jeffrey Jetsam. Shouldn't that be flotsam? No, trust me on this one.
description:
Jeffrey is the kind of person who tends to get on people's nerves. This is why, when he's finally taken that vacation across the Atlantic to go on a cruise in the Caribbean, Jeffrey's inability to know when to shut up meant that the annoyed fellow passengers had no qualms tossing him overboard. He's lucky there was no opportunity for such shenanigans during the plane ride.

Now, Jeffrey is stuck on a tiny desert island and has to find a way off.

This short point-and-click adventure features the vocal talents of Paul Thomas and Jon Paul Sapsford, as well as an original score also by Jon Paul Sapsford.
